sentences.en: A Delta II rocket was launched from Cape Canaveral early this morning.
sentences.cn: 今天一早，一枚“德尔塔”Ⅱ型火箭在卡纳维拉尔角发射升空。

sentences.en: Discovery's takeoff this morning from Cape Canaveral was flawless.
sentences.cn: “发现”号航天飞机今晨从卡纳维拉尔角顺利发射升空。

sentences.en: He made the crossing from Cape Town to Sydney in just over twenty-six days.
sentences.cn: 他在短短26天内从开普敦横渡到悉尼。

sentences.en: He swished his cape around his shoulders.
He used to go about in a black cape.
sentences.cn: 他以前常穿一件黑披风。

sentences.en: I like that part of Cape Town.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢开普敦的那片地方。

sentences.en: I long for a trip to the Cape of Good Hope.
sentences.cn: 我渴望到好望角去旅行.

sentences.en: She was wearing a cape over her dress.
sentences.cn: 她在外套上披着一件披肩.

sentences.en: The cape extends far into the ocean.
The freighter rounded the Cape of Good Hope and sailed into the Atlantic.
sentences.cn: 货轮绕过好望角,驶入大西洋.

sentences.en: The journey round Cape Horn demanded a high degree of seamanship.
sentences.cn: 绕好望角航行要求有高超的航海技术.

sentences.en: The sleeve edges and cape were also fringed.
The storms had abated by the time they rounded Cape Horn.
sentences.cn: 他们绕过合恩角时，暴风雨已经减弱。

sentences.en: We thought it best to divert our shipping round the Cape.
sentences.cn: 我们认为还是把我们的航运绕道好望角为妙.

sentences.en: When the boat reached Cape Town, we said a temporary goodbye.
sentences.cn: 客轮到达开普敦时，我们暂时分别。

phrases.tran_cn: 卡纳维拉尔角（位于美国）
开普敦（等于Capetown，南非西南部港市）
n. 佛得角群岛（大西洋岛国）

trans.tran_en: a long loose piece of clothing without sleeves that fastens around your neck and hangs from your shoulders
